steps.step: Heres the tricky part. Were going to blend the soup. Working in batches, transfer some of the soup liquid and broccoli to a blender.
Add half of the arugula leaves and blend until smooth.

Transfer to a bowl or another pot while you blend the second batch of soup with the rest of the arugula. Return to a pot over a low flame, check to see if it needs more salt or pepper. Throw in the juice of 1/2 a lemon and serve.This soup also freezes well!
